question_text: Which two symptoms strongly suggest a problem with a print server rather than the printer or client? (Select two)
answer_options: Printer test page prints fine locally
All users cannot print but can access other network resources
Spooler restart does not resolve issue
correct_answer: Printer test page prints fine locally
All users cannot print but can access other network resources
explanation: If the printer works independently and network is fine but jobs fail globally, the print server is likely the bottleneck.
